about_the_game:
Join us as we build the world of the Abomination Vaults. Wishlist and follow the game on Steam and Discord. With nearly 1,500 players already on our Discord, 5,000 backers and more than 15,000 who followed our Kickstarter, you too can become a community voice and get involved in our progress.





Delve deep into a sprawling mega dungeon beneath Gauntlight Keep. The Vaults are divided into several distinct biomes, each of which comprises its own chapter of the game.



Each biome presents new foes, hazards, and abominations for the players to overcome.



Four iconic champions of Pathfinder await your command: Amiri the Barbarian, Harsk the Ranger, Kyra the Cleric, and Ezren the Wizard. Each features unique play styles, abilities, and feats, allowing for deep Pathfinder-style customization.





Unleash a mix-and-matchable arsenal of deadly moves to annihilate your enemies. Leaping strikes, elemental barrages, poisoned bolts, rays of holy light. The Vaults are a canvas of destruction, and you are the artists!





Lean deeply into a particular role (healer, DPS, tank) or mix-and-match to define your own playstyle on the battlefield. Kyra the cleric can become a powerful support character, but she can also become a powerful blaster, or a mighty frontliner.



Will you build a balanced team with each character specializing in a unique role? Or will you build a team of pure damage that explodes enemies in a supernova of damage before they have a chance to attack? Or perhaps something else entirely!

We are designing a balanced approach that always works well, but we also want you to be able to experiment, try something crazy, and find some very powerful team compositions and ability interactions. We see this element of discovery and experimentation as part of the joy of playing Pathfinder!






Each character in Abomination Vaults is yours to customize via various advancement paths. Feat Selection allows players to tailor their character toward their preferred playstyle as they level up, gaining new powers and bonuses that enhance and specialize their hero. Our intent is to reflect the structure and flexibility found in Pathfinder Second Edition.






Many possibilities, including new loadouts with different characters, abilities, passives, and powers. The New Game + feature allows players to restart the adventure from the beginning with their progression intact and increased difficulty!





Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults is an epic adventure where cooperative play is key to defeating Belcorra's abominations and immersing yourself in the adventure. Are you ready to face the challenge and rescue Golarion? Prepare yourself for an unparalleled journey like none other.

Add Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults to your wishlist now.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-2500K or AMD™ FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 280 or Intel® Arc™ A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-4670K or AMD™ R3-1300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470 or Intel® Arc™ A380
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults is the first-ever co-op Hack and Slash ARPG based on the Adventure Path, in which players lead iconic Pathfinder heroes into the depths of Gauntlight Keep and battle deadly abominations to reach the evil sorceress Belcorra Haruvex and end her vile schemes.
